caption: This is a wonderful epic series clip. The background of it is in middle age. Two men are engaged in a conversation, with one of them appearing very silent and not particularly happy.Meanwhile, in a room, an elderly man and a woman are communicating. A comatose boy lies on the bed. Afterward, the woman starts knitting, but then brings in an assassin who attempts to kill them. However, the assassin fails.Simultaneously, in another tent, a woman is chatting, and they seem to be having a pleasant conversation. One of the women appears to hold a more esteemed position.In a snowy landscape, several people are walking, and then the scene returns to the earlier location with the woman who was the target of the assassination. She leaves the room and is walking in the city.
